null_button.title: ERROR: Null Button Error
null_button.message: Please select one of the buttons for the direction of the conveyor(s).

null_priority.title: ERROR: No User Priority
null_priority.message: Please enter your selected values for the user priority.

null_time.title: ERROR: Null Time Input
null_time.message: Please enter the time to run conveyor(s).

input_error.title: ERROR: Input Error
input_error.message: Please click only one direction for each conveyor.

priority_error.title: ERROR: At Least One Priority Input Error
